title: League Client is Crashing
body: Randomly the league client is crashing for me. Its a problem because i play draft pick and the league client crashes during champion select. Which gives me a ban for some time which doesn't apply to me. Please Help me ;.;

replies.body: Do you have a screenshot of the error you're seeing?  It's hard to say if this is a result of a network issue, or a possible bad game file that's causing you to crash.  Specifics on what you mean by crashing can help a lot!
